name: THE 11TH INTERNATIONAL SCIENTIFIC CONFERENCE "THE ROLE OF HUMANITIES, SOCIAL AND NATURAL SCIENCES IN SUPPORTING SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT"
content: The American Research Foundation, in cooperation with the Middle East Research Center and the Arab Conferences Network, invites researchers and academics in the education, higher education and scientific research sectors to participate in it's 11th International Scientific Conference, which will be held in Istanbul, Turkey on the 23rd and 24th of July 2020 under the title "The role of humanities, social and natural sciences in support of sustainable development". The conference theme supports the United Nations vision to support global sustainable development. The conference is held under the umbrella of the Arab Middle East Declaration for Open Access Research®, and in cooperation with the "Eyda3" a project for depositing scientific research in the Blockchain®.
organizers: THE AMERICAN RESEARCH FOUNDATION, IN COOPERATION WITH THE MIDDLE EAST RESEARCH CENTER AND THE ARAB C
